A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Some good moments\, but it is a BIG departure from what Star Wars has been\, and not in a good way. Very disappointed. That’s really unfortunate\, because other than the Death Star sized ball of disappointment I left with\, I would have been semi entertained. Nobody owes anyone an apology\, but someone sure as heck owes us our characters back. What a gut-punch!
